sentences.en: an agrarian economy (=  based on farming  )
Commodities were the basis of the agrarian economy that lasted for millennia.
sentences.cn: 产品是农业经济的基础,持续了几千年.

sentences.en: His classical urbanity comes to his relief -- if one can attribute urbanity to a former Agrarian.
sentences.cn: 是他的古典的优雅风格挽救了他, 如果我们可以用优雅这两个字来形容过去的重农主者的话.

sentences.en: It concluded with approval of the emphasis on the agrarian movement.
sentences.cn: 它的结论是赞成把重点放在土地运动上.

sentences.en: McKinley was eager to propitiate the agrarian Middle west after close over Bryan in 1896.
sentences.cn: 麦金莱于1896年在力量相匹敌的情况下战胜布赖恩后,急于要抚慰中西部农民.

sentences.en: People are leaving an agrarian way of life to go to the city.
sentences.cn: 人们正在放弃农业生活方式而转向城市.

sentences.en: See Agrarian China - published by the Institute of Pacific Relations.
sentences.cn: 见《中国农业》,太平洋研究所出版.

sentences.en: The patriarchal clan becomes the resistance revolution in the agrarian revolution the strength, therefore encounters suppresses and attacks.
sentences.cn: 在土地革命中宗族成为对抗革命的力量，所以遭到抑制和打击。

sentences.en: This applies especially for the agrarian structure and its development.
sentences.cn: 这一做法尤其适用于为农业结构及其发展.

sentences.en: This was a feature of agrarian development in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这是大不列颠土地发展的一个特征。

words.tran_cn: 田地均分法；平均地权论
土地的；耕地的；有关土地的

trans.tran_cn: 土地的，农业的，农村的，促进农业利益的
trans.tran_en: Agrarian means relating to the ownership and use of land, especially farmland, or relating to the part of a society or economy that is concerned with agriculture
